ModMetaData.name: Thats Not Clothing! MegaPack
ModMetaData.author: RutraNickers
ModMetaData.description:
Oi, nudist! It's just a freaking hat, why are you mad!? I can see literally EVERYTHING, YOU'RE NOT CLOTHED AT ALL!!
Multimod patch that makes any accessory/hat that isn't supposed to be heavy (and apparels that shows so much skin that your pawns are basically naked just with then) to be nudist friendly.
